inscription:
Signature, Inscription and Stamp

LRC, printed very lightly in black: [P. Mercury dis e inc in Perugi 1831]; LRC on mount, in pencil: [L. Robert et aprés Mercuri, Les Moissonneurs dans les Marais Pontins. B.F. 3e etat]; on back of mount, in pencil: various notes and inscriptions
provenance: Harry M. Drake, St. Paul; Estate of Harry M. Drake; bequeathed to MIA, 2013
signed: LLC, in the print: [LEOPOLD ROBERT / ROME 1830.]
title: Les Moissonneurs dans Les Marais Pontins
